attributes.review: i got it because i wanted to show my love and support for the sexy ass cheeto man but once i opened up the app it instantly crashed, so i shut my phone down and restarted it and then opened it back up however it still crashed so i did this process like 10 times until it finally opened with a picture of his tiny pp and i was so disturbed that i had to lay in my room for weeks in complete darkness and try to get the picture out of my brain, however it didn’t work and i’m now i’m therapy and on many pills so i can’t get this out for my brain

attributes.title: almost died...

attributes.review: This app is atrocious,despite taking exactly 8 days, 12 hours, 6 minutes, and 45 seconds to download. Once it finally downloaded, I opened the app, and it released such a high frequency that my dog is now deaf. He was so startled by the frequency that he started frantically running around in circles and he got dizzy and tipped over my jar of battery acid, and now he’s blind as well. Due to the excruciating pain he was facing he started jumping around and ended twisting the stove knob all the way to very high and the gas and battery acid reacted together to create a nuclear explosion. My entire neighborhood was wiped out, unknowingly thanks to Donald’s Stupid App. I only survived because I used my dog and my morbidly obese cat as shields to protect me from the explosions. For weeks on end all I’ve heard is pure agony and screams. I now have PTSD and every time I hear a loud noise go off I immediately burst into tears and reminisce on what was. I’ve gone to therapy, and even discussed my embarrassing pain with strangers and nothing helps anymore. I just want to be happy, I want to know what a real human connection is.The 4th if July was pure tragic and displeasure the whole night. On a brighter side luckily my human sized turtle also survived the explosion. And now she is my new love, for she is all I know. She’s my motivation to get stronger and get passed my traumatic experience. With these memories of pure disparity and tragedy, I demand that Mr. Donald J. Trump, the people’s president cause he sure as hell ain’t mine, buy me a new home, a new Tibetan Mastiff dog, a new family, and give me the right to marry my turtle, without being looked at in a weird and inhuman way. All I say is if you don’t want to experience such a horrifying and traumatic experience that I have please do not download such app. #Bernie2020
attributes.title: By All Means Please Do Not Download This App

attributes.review:
This app is very bad.When I opened it my phone kept Turing off and when I tried to do something my phone would power off.After using this app I started to see a lot of dead people. It’s like they were talking to me.It was very scary and I almost had a fight with one of them.Water started drowning my apartment out and roaches and spiders were all around the house.Mouses was there too I was very scared.When I deleted the app every thing went back to normal.But Sometimes I do see dead people and they look like oranges with blonde hair.😭😭😭💀 I don't recommend getting the app or the same thing that happened to me WILL HAPPEN TO YOU.    

Sincerely,
  UNKNOWN😘🥱😌
